item.name: Starflower
item.text:
A bright, white star-shaped flower that grows on floating islands. Upon eating this flower, you gain a flying speed of 60 feet for ten minutes.
Source: Monsters of Feyland 2: The Well of Dreams p. 32 (Homebrew)

item.name: Sadieberry
item.text:
When you consume this berry, you can walk on water for 1d10 minutes.
Source: Monsters of Feyland 2: The Well of Dreams p. 54 (Homebrew)

item.name: Hystranger
item.text:
These talking flowers strike up conversations with newcomers to Feyland. They offer vague, but sometimes helpful advice. Hystrangers need a great deal more water than most plants.
Source: Monsters of Feyland 2: The Well of Dreams p. 69 (Homebrew)

item.name: Sweetblossom
item.detail: flora, pink and yellow heart-shaped flower
item.text:
After you smell this flower, you make any Charisma checks or saving throws with advantage for 1 minute. You can gain this benefit only once per day.
Source: Monsters of Feyland 2: The Well of Dreams p. 106 (Homebrew)

item.name: Bag of Treats
item.text:
This bright red bag is made of simple cloth. You can use an action to reach inside and retrieve delicious desserts for 1d8 humanoids. Once the bag is used, it doesn't function again until the next dawn. The bag weighs 1 pound.
Source: Monsters of Feyland 2: The Well of Dreams p. 26 (Homebrew)

item.name: Never Cloak
item.text:
A golden hooded cloak. You can use a bonus action to put the cloak's hood up to activate it. While activated you can cast the misty step spell three times a day.
Source: Monsters of Feyland 2: The Well of Dreams p. 72 (Homebrew)

item.name: Butterfly Fan
item.text:
This stylish blue fan is decorated with painted pink butterflies. You can use an action to conjure a swarm of pink butterflies in a 60-foot radius centered on yourself for one minute. The area is heavily obscured, and you can use a bonus action to take the Dash action. Once used, the fan doesn't function again until the next dawn.
Source: Monsters of Feyland 2: The Well of Dreams p. 104 (Homebrew)

item.name: Alice's Ring
item.text:
When wearing this blue ring, you can use an action to shrink yourself as if you cast enlarge/reduce on yourself. The ring has 3 charges. Each use of the ring expends 1 charge. The ring regains all expended charges daily at dawn.
Source: Monsters of Feyland 2: The Well of Dreams p. 143 (Homebrew)
